content: अभ्युदि {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> [उद्-इ] {@--1@} To rise (<ab>fig.</ab> also); go up (as the sun); <ls>Ms. 4. 104.</ls> {@--2@} To rise over (one); <ls>Ms. 2. 220</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">219.</ls> {@--3@} To come into existence, happen, originate. {@--4@} To engage in combat with (one), encounter, (लोकवीरान्) को जीवितार्थी समरेऽभ्युदीयात् <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--5@} To prosper, thrive.
